articles.title: Supreme Court Seems Skeptical of Trump Colorado Ballot Ban
articles.description: During oral arguments, justices from both conservative and liberal wings expressed concerns about allowing individual states to disqualify presidential candidates under the 14th Amendment's insurrection clause.

articles.title: Microsoft's AI Chief Leaves to Launch New AI Venture
articles.description: Kevin Scott, Microsoft's Chief Technology Officer and AI leader, is departing the company to start his own artificial intelligence venture while maintaining an advisory role at Microsoft.

articles.title: King Charles III Diagnosed With Cancer
articles.description: Buckingham Palace announced that King Charles III has been diagnosed with cancer discovered during his recent prostate treatment. The King has begun regular treatments and postponed public duties.
